changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.is_job_active(job bigint) RETURNS boolean AS 'com.chiralbehaviors.CoRE.meta.models.JobModelImpl.is_job_active(java.lang.Long)' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.is_job_active(bigint) OWNER TO core;
